bwwExcerpt: A: Teaming with Avenue Q co-creator Robert Lopez (South Park creators Matt Stone and Trey Parker) to wrote a perfect book, music, and lyrics, they honor the traditions of great song-and-dance musical theater in all the best ways: Every detail of the production - choreographed with typical brilliance by Spamalot's Casey Nicholaw and codirected by Nicholaw and Parker - serves a purpose.
showScoreExcerpt: "An exhilarating Broadway musical at once revolutionary and classic, funny and obscene, uncompromising in production standards and unafraid of just about anything else."
